title: ExtractField Single Message Transform
description: Configuration schema for ExtractField transformation. Extracts a field from a struct and uses it as the key or value.

type.description: The transformation type. Use 'org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.ExtractField$Key' for key transformation or 'org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.ExtractField$Value' for value transformation.
type.title: type

field.description: The field name to extract from the struct.
field.title: field

defaultSnippets.label: ExtractField - Extract value field
defaultSnippets.description: Extract a field from the record value and use it as the new value. Replace 'id' with your actual field name.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**ExtractField** - Extract a field from the record value and use it as the new value.

Replace `id` with your actual field name.

**Use case:** When you need to simplify a record by extracting a single field.

defaultSnippets.label: ExtractField - Extract key field
defaultSnippets.description: Extract a field from the record key and use it as the new key. Replace 'userId' with your actual key field name.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**ExtractField** - Extract a field from the record key and use it as the new key.

Replace `userId` with your actual key field name.

**Use case:** When you need to simplify a composite key by extracting a single field.
